name: FrontLine (dabt0402)
description:
Made by dabt0402 in ue4 for the devatlas game jam, all assets made by dabt0402 during the game jam

Theme interpretation:
"Hold the line" - dont let the territory line get in the opponent favor ,push the line in your favor or  hold it until the round is over to win.

How to play:
WASD to move
Left mouse button to shoot and place walls during the build phase
Kill enemies to push the territory line forward, and don't die or the line will get pushed agaisnt you, hold it until the rounds are over or get 100% dominance

6 difficulties in the game


Tips: 
-Build walls around you during the build phase in a circular/semi circular pattern so you dont get flanked
-Flat sets of walls are only useful to stop the enemy front fire, wont stop them from just going around
-Higher difficulties require more skill and practise with wall placement
-Avoid going into open areas
